name: Devfacto
tagline: DEDICATED TO CREATING SOFTWARE HUMANS LOVE TO USE
description:
DevFacto creates software that humans love to use. 
We specialize in business intelligence and analytics, portals and collaboration, enterprise mobility, custom development and managed application services.
We know that humans, not machines, use our applications and so we focus on building software that is effective and enjoyable to use. 
Since 2007, we have delivered ideas and solutions that improve efficiency, inspire team collaboration and engage employees.
